comment: I really enjoyed this. It’s not really whisky, but it’s tasty. It isn’t sickly sweet either. It’s more of a cinnamon baking type spice, but I’m ok with that.
Hands down favorite, goes down like root beer .
A little sweet.  Spicy zing at the finish but not too much.  Mild.  Strong vanilla nose.  Very little burn.  Low proof at 70.6
